# timer

Display argument command output with time

## Example

```
$ timer bash -c 'for i in {1..10}; do echo $i; sleep 1; done'
2022-09-16 12:40:57.100116318 +09:00 | 1
2022-09-16 12:40:58.101771853 +09:00 | 2
2022-09-16 12:40:59.104073708 +09:00 | 3
2022-09-16 12:41:00.106442688 +09:00 | 4
2022-09-16 12:41:01.108407660 +09:00 | 5
2022-09-16 12:41:02.109906464 +09:00 | 6
2022-09-16 12:41:03.111623637 +09:00 | 7
2022-09-16 12:41:04.112927205 +09:00 | 8
2022-09-16 12:41:05.115011106 +09:00 | 9
2022-09-16 12:41:06.117304003 +09:00 | 10
```
